item.title: 中国《环球时报》警告：美国将受到其他国家 "高关税 "的冲击
item.description: 中国国家媒体警告说，随着其他国家以 "高关税 "回击美国商品，美国的关税将对美国经济造成重大损害。【原文：U.S. tariffs will inflict significant harm on the U.S. economy as other countries hit back with "high tariffs" on American goods, Chinese state media warned, leaving the door open for more measures by Beijing as another wave of levies looms.】

item.title: 瑞士国家银行在 2024 年购买价值 12 亿瑞士法郎的外汇
item.description: 瑞士央行周二表示，瑞士国家银行将在2024年购买价值12亿瑞士法郎（13.6亿美元）的外汇，在控制通货膨胀后大幅减少干预措施。【原文：The Swiss National Bank bought foreign currency worth 1.2 billion Swiss francs ($1.36 billion) in 2024, the central bank said on Tuesday, dramatically reducing its interventions after bringing inflation under control.】

item.title: 解说员：比亚迪等中国汽车制造商为何推出快速充电电动车系统？
item.description: 中国比亚迪发布了兆瓦级充电系统，称其充电速度与给电动汽车加满油一样快，并表示将在全中国建立网络，从而引发一场新的超级充电竞赛。【原文：China's BYD has unveiled a megawatt charging system that it says can charge an EV as quickly as filling up a fuel tank, and said it will build a network across China, igniting a new super charging race.】

item.title: 大型制药公司担心最畅销药物成为美欧关税争端的牺牲品
item.description: 药品生产商正在敦促特朗普政府和欧盟官员将医疗商品排除在不断扩大的关税战之外，希望避免欧洲生产的畅销药品（从诺和诺德的减肥药 Wegovy 到默克的癌症免疫疗法 Keytruda）价格飙升。【原文：Drugmakers are urging the Trump administration and European Union officials to exclude medical goods from expanding tariff wars, hoping to avert price spikes on top-selling medicines made in Europe from Novo Nordisk's Wegovy for weight loss to Merck's cancer immunotherapy Keytruda.】

item.title: 早间竞标关注特朗普与普京会谈，再看央行大放水
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 马自达努力节约成本，通胀威胁投资支出增长
item.description: 日本汽车制造商马自达汽车公司（Mazda Motor）周二表示，在通货膨胀可能导致成本上升的情况下，该公司将利用合作伙伴关系和现有的制造工厂，控制电气化方面的投资。【原文：Japanese automaker Mazda Motor said on Tuesday it will keep investments in its electrification efforts in check by making use of partnerships and its existing manufacturing plants after inflation threatened to push up costs.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，Sycamore 收购沃尔格林博姿后，Stefano Pessina 所持股份将增加近一倍
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周二援引知情人士的话报道称，作为私募股权集团 Sycamore 收购美国药店集团的一部分，沃尔格林博姿联盟执行主席斯特凡诺-佩西纳（Stefano Pessina）所持股份将增加近一倍，达到约 30%。【原文：Walgreens Boots Alliance's executive chair Stefano Pessina will almost double his stake in the US pharmacy group to about 30% as part of its takeover by private equity group Sycamore, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德勤表示，2025 年女性精英体育运动的收入将超过 23.5 亿美元
item.description: 德勤（Deloitte）周二表示，到 2025 年，女子精英体育的全球收入将从去年的 18.8 亿美元增至 23.5 亿美元。【原文：Global revenues in women's elite sports will surpass $2.35 billion in 2025, up from $1.88 billion last year, Deloitte said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 澳新银行将 6 个月黄金预测值上调至每盎司 3,200 美元
item.description: 澳新银行周二发布研究报告称，将零至三个月的金价预期上调至每盎司3100美元，将六个月的预期上调至每盎司3200美元。【原文：ANZ raised its zero to 3-month gold price forecast to $3,100 per ounce and 6-month forecast to $3,200 per ounce, according to a research note on Tuesday.】

item.title: 对冲基金和制药公司首席执行官出席中国商业峰会
item.description: 在中国寻求吸引外资以抵消美国关税和国内消费疲软之际，数十位外国首席执行官将于本月访问北京，参加一个旗舰商务会议，其中一些人还将与习近平主席会面。【原文：Dozens of foreign CEOs will visit Beijing this month for a flagship business conference and some will meet with President Xi Jinping, as China seeks to attract foreign investment to offset U.S. tariffs and sluggish domestic consumption.】

item.title: 贝莱德、先锋和道富要求法院驳回美国反垄断诉讼
item.description: 贝莱德（BlackRock）、先锋集团（Vanguard）和道富银行（State Street）周一晚些时候要求德克萨斯州一家法院驳回指控它们合谋减少煤炭产量的美国州级诉讼，称这些指控是 "半生不熟、未经检验的 "法律理论。【原文：BlackRock , Vanguard and State Street asked a Texas court late on Monday to dismiss a U.S. state lawsuit accusing them of conspiring to decrease coal output, saying the allegations were "half-baked and untested" legal theories.】

item.title: 香港股市和新西兰元因中国前景而上涨
item.description: 由于投资者对全球第二大经济体的前景转为乐观，并对近期数据和进一步支持消费的承诺感到高兴，周二香港股市升至三年高点，并引领亚洲市场走高。【原文：Hong Kong shares rose to three-year highs and led Asian markets higher on Tuesday, as investors turn positive on the outlook for the world's second-biggest economy and cheered recent data and promises to further support consumption.】

item.title: 经济放缓忧虑抵消中国数据和中东风险，油价走势低迷
item.description: 周二早盘，油价变化不大，原因是全球经济增长忧虑、美国关税和俄乌停火谈判抵消了可能影响供应的中东不稳定加剧的影响。【原文：Oil prices were little changed in early trading on Tuesday as global growth concerns, U.S. tariffs and Russia-Ukraine ceasefire talks offset increased instability in the Middle East that could impact supply.】

item.title: 关税不确定性加剧避险需求，黄金再创新高，升破 3000 美元
item.description: 周二，金价在一周内第二次突破关键的3000美元大关，创下历史新高，原因是美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税政策加剧了投资者对经济的担忧。【原文：Gold prices scaled a record peak above the key $3,000 mark on Tuesday for the second time within a week, as investors sought cover from economic concerns fuelled by U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff polices.】

item.title: NAB 首席执行官警告特朗普的 "疯狂关税 "可能终结澳大利亚的宽松周期
item.description: 澳大利亚全国银行（NAB）首席执行官安德鲁-欧文（Andrew Irvine）周二表示，如果美国总统唐纳德-特朗普煽动的 "疯狂关税 "升级为全球贸易战，澳大利亚的降息周期可能就到头了。【原文：Australia may be at the end of its cycle of interest rate cuts if the "tariff madness" instigated by U.S. President Donald Trump escalates into a global trade war, NAB CEO Andrew Irvine said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美元维持在 5 个月低点附近，难以摆脱对经济增长的担忧
item.description: 美元兑欧元和其他主要货币周二跌至五个月低点附近，因为投资者正在努力应对全球贸易紧张局势加剧可能带来的经济影响。【原文：The U.S. dollar wallowed near a five-month trough against the euro and other major peers on Tuesday as investors grappled with the potential economic impact of growing global trade tensions.】

item.title: 独家报道文件显示：越南开发商提议对巨额欺诈案核心银行实施 15 年救助
item.description: 路透社看到的文件显示，越南最大金融欺诈案的核心银行获得了中央银行的救助，金额相当于该国 2024 年经济产出的 5%，当地的一位白武士希望在 15 年内偿还这笔钱。【原文：The bank at the centre of Vietnam's biggest financial fraud has received a central bank bailout amounting 5% of the nation's 2024 economic output, which a local white knight hopes to repay in 15 years, documents seen by Reuters show.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，桑坦德银行希望通过与 Verizon 合作开展美国业务
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一报道，西班牙银行业巨头桑坦德银行（Banco Santander）正通过与 Verizon 的合作，利用 Verizon 庞大的客户群，努力扩大其在美国的业务。【原文：Spanish banking giant Banco Santander is pushing to expand its U.S. operations through a partnership that taps into Verizon's vast customer base, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国商务部各局禁止中国的 DeepSeek 在政府设备上使用
item.description: 根据路透社和两位熟悉此事的人士看到的一条信息，美国商务部各局在最近几周通知工作人员，他们的政府设备禁止使用中国人工智能模型 DeepSeek。【原文：U.S. Commerce department bureaus informed staffers in recent weeks that Chinese artificial intelligence model DeepSeek is banned on their government devices, according to a message seen by Reuters and two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 受美国贸易战影响，多伦多将特斯拉排除在电动汽车激励措施之外
item.description: 多伦多市长奥利维亚-周（Olivia Chow）周一表示，由于与美国的贸易关系紧张，多伦多将不再为购买特斯拉汽车作为出租车或共享汽车提供财政激励。【原文：Toronto is no longer providing financial incentives for Tesla vehicles purchased as taxis or ride shares due to trade tensions with the United States, the city's mayor, Olivia Chow, said on Monday.】

item.title: 金丝雀资本（Canary Capital）继续提交美国加密货币交易所交易基金（ETF）申请，并提出了 "隋"（Sui）方案
item.description: 数字资产投资公司金丝雀资本集团（Canary Capital Group）周一表示，该公司正在寻求监管机构的绿灯，以推出与区块链服务提供商隋网络（Sui Network）的加密货币隋（Sui）的现货价格挂钩的交易所交易基金。【原文：Canary Capital Group, a digital assets investment firm, said on Monday that it is seeking the green light from regulators to launch an exchange-traded fund tied to the spot price of Sui, a cryptocurrency associated with Sui Network, a blockchain service provider.】

item.title: Glencore 就潜在交易与电池回收商 Li-Cycle 接洽
item.description: 在伦敦上市的嘉能可公司（Glencore）已提出收购加拿大锂电池回收公司 Li-Cycle 的建议，作为抵消运营和财务问题建议的一部分。【原文：London-listed Glencore has made an offer to acquire Canadian lithium battery recycling company Li-Cycle as part of a proposal to offset operational and financial issues.】

item.title: 七国集团（G7）财长在虚拟会议上讨论全球贸易和经济增长问题
item.description: 加拿大财政部在一份声明中说，七大经济强国的财政部长们在周一的虚拟会议上讨论了全球贸易、竞争力和经济增长等问题。【原文：The finance ministers from the Group of Seven economic powers discussed issues including global trade, competitiveness, and economic growth in a virtual meeting on Monday, the Canadian finance ministry said in a statement.】

item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 国有股东在关键投票中弃权，JBS 距离美国上市更近一步
item.description: 巴西肉类加工企业 JBS 的控股股东和第二大股东--政府投资机构 BNDESPar 达成了一项协议，使该公司的股票更接近在美国和巴西上市。【原文：The controlling shareholder of Brazilian meatpacker JBS and government investment vehicle BNDESPar, its second largest shareholder, have inked a deal that puts the company closer to listing its shares in both the United States and Brazil.】

item.title: 特朗普提名美联储理事鲍曼为负责监管的副主席
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普提名美联储理事米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）担任央行最高监管职位--负责监管事务的副主席，预计她将监督放宽规则制定和银行监管的议程。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump nominated Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman to the central bank's top regulatory post as vice chair for supervision where she is expected to oversee an agenda of relaxed rule-writing and bank oversight.】

item.title: 富国银行称 OCC 终止了 2021 年损失缓减同意令
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo）周一表示，美国货币监理署（OCC）已经终止了 2021 年的一项同意令，该同意令与该行房屋贷款业务中的损失缓减做法有关。【原文：Wells Fargo said on Monday the U.S. Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC) has terminated a 2021 consent order tied to loss mitigation practices in the bank's home lending business.】
